response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's truly worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value to you, we propose a special introductory price of $120. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the market value. We're confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
